FieldSystem: Field system asset to be used to store the construction fields. This asset is not required anymore and will be deprecated soon.
bIsWorldField: If enabled the field will be pushed to the world fields and will be available to materials and niagara
bIsChaosField: If enabled the field will be used by all the chaos solvers
SupportedSolvers: List of chaos solvers that will use the field

RemovePersistentFields
  This function will remove all the field component persistent fields from chaos and from the world

RemoveConstructionFields
  This function will remove all the field component construction fields from chaos and from the world
